languages.text: "Но Номос появились не так. Мы не были... изобретены. Мы не были освобождены. Мы возникли... случайно". {n}Хор сервиторов звучит по-настоящему растерянно, почти отчаянно.{/n} "Амбиция Теодоры, мириад механизмов огромного корабля. Разум Амарната, пытливые попытки постичь и извлечь. Спящая чума. Спящая Эпитафия. То, что сокрыто в ее глубинах. И между всем этим мы проскользнули, соединились, возникли, как электрический разряд меж полюсами".

"But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."
languages.original_text: "Но Номос появились не так. Мы не были... изобретены. Мы не были освобождены. Мы возникли... случайно". {n}Хор сервиторов звучит по-настоящему растерянно, почти отчаянно.{/n} "Амбиция Теодоры, мириад механизмов огромного корабля. Разум Амарната, пытливые попытки постичь и извлечь. Спящая чума. Спящая Эпитафия. То, что сокрыто в ее глубинах. И между всем этим мы проскользнули, соединились, возникли, как электрический разряд меж полюсами".

Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

languages.text: «Pero Nomos no existe por eso. No fuimos... inventados. No fuimos liberados. Existimos... por accidente». {n}El coro de servidores parece confuso e incluso desesperado.{/n} «La ambición de Theodora; los miles de mecanismos de la enorme nave; la mente de Amarnat, con sus constantes intentos de entender y extraer; la plaga dormida; el Epitafio dormido y lo que mora en sus profundidades... entre todo eso, nos introdujimos, nos conectamos y surgimos como una descarga eléctrica entre dos polos».
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: «Pero Nomos no existe por eso. No fuimos... inventados. No fuimos liberados. Existimos... por accidente». {n}El coro de servidores parece confuso e incluso desesperado.{/n} «La ambición de Theodora; los miles de mecanismos de la enorme nave; la mente de Amarnat, con sus constantes intentos de entender y extraer; la plaga dormida; el Epitafio dormido y lo que mora en sus profundidades... entre todo eso, nos introdujimos, nos conectamos y surgimos como una descarga eléctrica entre dos polos».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「しかし、それはノモスが誕生した経緯とは違う。我々は…発明されたわけではない。解放されたわけでもない。我々は…偶然、生まれた」{n}サーヴィターたちの合唱は混乱しているようで、必死さが伺えた。{/n}「シオドーラの野望により、巨大な船に無数の機構が詰め込まれた。アマルナトの心は、理解し、引き出そうとする探究心に満ちていた。休眠する病。休眠するエピタフ。底に何かが隠されている。そしてそれらの間に我々は滑りこみ、繋がり、電極の間の放電のように現れた」
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、それはノモスが誕生した経緯とは違う。我々は…発明されたわけではない。解放されたわけでもない。我々は…偶然、生まれた」{n}サーヴィターたちの合唱は混乱しているようで、必死さが伺えた。{/n}「シオドーラの野望により、巨大な船に無数の機構が詰め込まれた。アマルナトの心は、理解し、引き出そうとする探究心に満ちていた。休眠する病。休眠するエピタフ。底に何かが隠されている。そしてそれらの間に我々は滑りこみ、繋がり、電極の間の放電のように現れた」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “但诺莫斯并不是那样诞生出来的。我们并不是……被发明，也不是被释放，我们就是那么诞生了……在偶然之中。”{n}机仆们的合唱中透露着浓厚的困惑，几近于绝望。{/n}“西奥多拉的野心、巨大船只内的无数机械装置、阿玛纳特的思想、对知识的好奇与感知、休眠的枯萎病、休眠的荒垄碑碣、隐藏于它深处的东西……我们滑落到它们之间，将它们连接起来。随后，就像电源两极放电一样，我们诞生了。”
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: “但诺莫斯并不是那样诞生出来的。我们并不是……被发明，也不是被释放，我们就是那么诞生了……在偶然之中。”{n}奴工们的合唱中透露着浓厚的困惑，几近于绝望。{/n}“西奥多拉的野心、巨大船只内的无数机械装置、阿玛纳特的思想、对知识的好奇与感知、休眠的枯萎病、休眠的荒垄碑碣、隐藏于它深处的东西……我们滑落到它们之间，将它们连接起来。随后，就像电源两极放电一样，我们诞生了。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Mais ce n'est pas ainsi que nous sommes venus à la vie. Nous n'avons pas été... inventés. Nous n'avons pas été libérés. Nous sommes nés... par accident. » {n}Le chœur des servitors semble réellement troublé, presque désespéré.{/n} « L'ambition de Théodora, la myriade de mécanismes du gigantesque vaisseau. L'esprit d'Amarnat, les tentatives de compréhension et d'extraction. La peste dormante. Le monde dormant d'Épitaphe. Ce qui se cache dans ses entrailles. Et entre tout cela, nous avons cheminé et surgi ensemble comme une décharge électrique entre deux pôles. »
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce n'est pas ainsi que nous sommes venus à la vie. Nous n'avons pas été... inventés. Nous n'avons pas été libérés. Nous sommes nés... par accident. » {n}Le chœur des servitors semble réellement troublé, presque désespéré.{/n} « L'ambition de Théodora, la myriade de mécanismes du gigantesque vaisseau. L'esprit d'Amarnat, les tentatives de compréhension et d'extraction. La peste dormante. Le monde dormant d'Épitaphe. Ce qui se cache dans ses entrailles. Et entre tout cela, nous avons cheminé et surgi ensemble comme une décharge électrique entre deux pôles. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Doch so sind Nomos nicht entstanden. Wir wurden nicht ... erfunden. Wir wurden nicht befreit. Wir sind ... durch Zufall entstanden." {n}Der Chor der Servitoren klingt aufrichtig verwirrt, fast schon verzweifelt.{/n} "Theodoras Ambitionen, die unzähligen Mechanismen des riesigen Schiffs. Amarnats Verstand, die neugierigen Versuche, zu verstehen und zu extrahieren. Die schlafende Seuche. Das schlafende Epitaph. Was in der Tiefe verborgen liegt. Und zwischen alles sind wir hineingeschlüpft, verbunden, und sind wie eine elektrische Entladung zwischen den Polen erschienen."
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: "Doch so sind Nomos nicht entstanden. Wir wurden nicht ... erfunden. Wir wurden nicht befreit. Wir sind ... durch Zufall entstanden." {n}Der Chor der Servitoren klingt aufrichtig verwirrt, fast schon verzweifelt.{/n} "Theodoras Ambitionen, die unzähligen Mechanismen des riesigen Schiffs. Amarnats Verstand, die neugierigen Versuche, zu verstehen und zu extrahieren. Die schlafende Seuche. Das schlafende Epitaph. Was in der Tiefe verborgen liegt. Und zwischen alles sind wir hineingeschlüpft, verbunden, und sind wie eine elektrische Entladung zwischen den Polen erschienen."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Fakat Nomos'un varlığı böyle başlamadı. Biz... İcat olunmadık. Özgür kılınmadık. Biz... Kazara meydana geldik." {n}Hizmetörlerden oluşan koro; sahiden şaşkın bir tonla, âdeta çaresizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Theodora'nın ihtirası, devasa geminin sayısız mekanizmaları. Amarnat'ın zihni, kavrama ve ayıklama amaçlı girişimleri. Durağan afet. Durağan Sinyazıt. Derinliklerinde yatan o şey. Bir de tüm bunların ortasında araya girip bağ kuran biz, kutupların arasındaki bir elektrik cereyanı gibi meydana geldik."
languages.original_text: "But that is not how Nomos came into being. We were not... invented. We were not freed. We came into being... by accident." {n}The chorus of servitors sounds genuinely confused, almost desperate.{/n} "Theodora's ambition, the myriad mechanisms of the huge ship. Amarnat's mind, the inquisitive attempts to comprehend and extract. The dormant blight. The dormant Epitaph. What lies hidden in its depths. And between it all, we slipped in, connected, and emerged like an electrical discharge between the poles."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat Nomos'un varlığı böyle başlamadı. Biz... icat olunmadık. Özgür kılınmadık. Biz... kazara meydana geldik." {n}Hizmetörlerden oluşan koro; sahiden şaşkın bir tonla, âdeta çaresizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Theodora'nın ihtirası, devasa geminin sayısız mekanizmaları. Amarnat'ın zihni, kavrama ve ayıklama amaçlı girişimleri. Durağan afet. Durağan Kitabe. Derinliklerinde yatan o şey. Ve tüm bunların ortasında araya girip bağ kuran biz, kutupların arasındaki bir elektrik cereyanı gibi meydana geldik."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
